item.description:
New to Boston or to our meetup group? Join us for good conversation, company and food. dinner. A few of us from tennis will be going to dinner.

Do you enjoy beef with watercress, soup dumplings, 3 cup chicken or maybe even stinky tofu? We can enjoy some shaved ice or froyo nearby after dinner.

By T - take B train (Green Line) and get off at Comm. Ave and Harvard Ave intersection and walk a few blocks down to Brighton Ave.

Parking - is always tough in this area. Sometimes there are more spots on Brighton Ave towards Super 88 food court.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner @ Jo Jo Taipei
